Package com.cyberfront.crdt.unittest.data

Class AssessmentSupport

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cyberfront.crdt.unittest.data.AssessmentSupport
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Test01Create.CreateTest, Test01Generic.GenericTest, Test01Json.JsonTest, Test01Operator.UpdateTest, Test01Simulation.SimulationTest, Test02Update.UpdateTest, Test03Clone.CloneTest, Test04Json

    public class AssessmentSupport
extends java.lang.Object
    The AssessmentSupport class is a base class for all of the unit test classes. It manages a number of attributes for test cases which comprise the collection of its derived classes.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AssessmentSupport

        public AssessmentSupport​()
        Default class constructor which initializes the members to their default values given by the corresponding static constant values.

      • AssessmentSupport

        public AssessmentSupport​(long trialCount,
                         long abbreviatedFactor,
                         long stressedFactor,
                         boolean abbreviated,
                         boolean stressed)
        Class constructor used to explicitly define the various parameters for the base test class
        Parameters:
        trialCount - Number of trials to perform over the course of the unit test
        abbreviatedFactor - Division factor to use on the argument when performing an abbreviated test
        stressedFactor - Multiplication factor to use on the arguments when performing a stress test
        abbreviated - Flag indicating whether this is an abbreviated test
        stressed - Flag indicating whether this is a stress test

        protected static java.util.Collection<com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode> genValues​(long count,

                                                                                         double pString)
        Generate a collection of JsonNode values

        pNull - Probability of a given value being null
        pBoolean - Probability of a given value being a Boolean value
        pLong - Probability of a given value being a Long value
        pDouble - Probability of a given value being a Double value
        pString - Probability of a given value being a String value
        Returns:
        A collection of JsonNode values

                                                                            double pLong,
                                                                            double pDouble,
                                                                            double pString)
        Generate and return a JsonNode containing a JsonArray of mock JsonPatch documents
        Parameters:

        pBoolean - Probability of a given value being a Boolean value
        pLong - Probability of a given value being a Long value
        pDouble - Probability of a given value being a Double value

        Returns:

      • generateOperations

        protected static java.util.Collection<com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode> generateOperations​(int instCount,
                                                                                                  int diffCount,
                                                                                                  double pBoolean,
                                                                                                  double pLong,
                                                                                                  double pDouble,
                                                                                                  double pString)
        Generate and return a collection of JsonPatch instances as a collection of JsonNode documents
        Parameters:
        instCount - Number of instances to create in the resulting collection
        diffCount - Number of operation elements in each difference element
        pBoolean - Probability of a given value being a Boolean value
        pLong - Probability of a given value being a Long value
        pDouble - Probability of a given value being a Double value
        pString - Probability of a given value being a String value
        Returns:
        A collection of JsonPatch instances as a collection of JsonNode documents
